cards.rules_text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 white TYPE creature token. Then if an opponent controls more creature than you, create another one of those tokens.
[-1]: Put a +1/+1 on each creature you control. They gain vigilance until end of turn.
[-3]: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.rules_text:
[+1]: Untap up to two permanents you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature untapped this way.
[-2]: Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
[-X]: Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of permanent cards with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

cards.rules_text:
Impending 8—{1}{B}{B}
Menace
Whenever Demonlord Darvas-Zan enters or attacks, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, and shuffle.
Sacrifice a creature: Remove a time counter from Demonlord Darvas-Zan.

When this creature enters, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it until this creature leaves the battlefield.
Return a card exiled with this creature to its owner's hand: You may cast a copy of that card and you may spend mana as though it were of any color to cast that card. Activate only as a sorcery.

Vigilance
When this creature enters, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token.
Sacrifice this creature: Creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

Prowess
Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to this creature's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

Choose one —
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
• Counter target instant or sorcery spell.
• Scry 1. Draw a card.

This spells deals 2 damage to any target.
{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: This card deals 1 damage to any target.

Whenever a creature dies, choose one that has not been chosen this turn. If you can't each opponent discards a card —
• Create a Treasure token.
• You draw a card and lose 1 life.
• Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Menace
Whenever this creature attacks, exile up to one creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard. Create a token copy that's tapped and attacking. Sacrifice that token at the end of your turn.

Haste
At the beginning of your first main phase each turn, put a -1/-1 counter on this creature.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

Trample
This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each land card in your graveyard.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Escape—{2}{W}{W}, exile five other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
This creature escapes with another creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard.

Return target creature with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback {W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

[i]Converge[/i] — When this creature enters, search your library for an Equipment card with mana value less than or equal to the number of colors spent to cast this creature, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
